Questions.Title: How to create a RESTful API in ASP.NET Core?
Questions.Body: I want to build a RESTful API in ASP.NET Core. Can someone guide me through the steps?

Questions.Title: What are the best practices for database design in EF Core?
Questions.Body: I'm looking for tips on designing a database using Entity Framework Core. Any advice?

Answers.Body: You can start by creating a new ASP.NET Core project and adding controllers with [ApiController] attribute.
For database access, consider using Entity Framework Core and define your models and DbContext.
When designing a database with EF Core, always think about the relationships between your entities.
